cards.name: Flambarb
cards.description: Flambarn is a majestic fire-type Pokemon clad in ornate armor. It can be found roaming deserts and other hot and arid environments. Flambarn is a solitary pokemon that patrols its domain with courage and strength. Its fiery presence is a sight to behold, and one Flare Surge is enough to send even the bravest of challengers running! Flambarn is a noble monster, feared and respected by all who cross its path.
cards.image_prompt: Flambarb::0 a epic fire-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a desert environment, blue and red ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
